title: (x) Panavision logo - custom designed {Mike Diaz}
content:
hello  
looking for a similar font as used in the PANAVISION logo attached

i'm recreating the look

thanks in advance for any help

marisa  
 [www.ritzyperiwinkle.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130811122536/http:/www.ritzyperiwinkle.com/ "www.ritzyperiwinkle.com")

author: ritzyp

comments.content:
Hi there:  
It's a custom logo but it appears to be based off of Futura (small caps italic medium/demi weight). Then put a few funky squares letters in there.

Hope I helped,

Mikey
hey mikey.. thanks man. i will try that..good looking out
